name: import2-spirits-v5
description: Final country import - Import to final destination country with local compliance
instruction:
Record the final import into destination country with full local regulatory compliance.

Key information to capture:
- Importer name (FIRST FIELD - used for identity display)
- Transfer date
- From entity (previous holder)
- Destination country
- Batch number and bottle range
- Number of bottles and total volume
- Storage conditions at bonded warehouse
- Quality check status
- QR blockchain verification status
- Transport method
- Import license with CID for audit
- GACC certificate with CID for audit (China)
- Health certificate with CID for audit
- Bilingual labeling compliance
- Labeling languages
- Transfer notes

This step records entry into final market with all regulatory approvals.
resource: Example: Shanghai Premium Imports receives 150 bottles (range 1-150) from Golden Dragon Spirits, Hong Kong on April 20, 2024. Secured ground transport Hong Kong to Shanghai bonded zone. Chinese customs cleared with import license CN-IMPORT-SPIRITS-2024-SH-B47. GACC health certificate GACC-HEALTH-CERT-2024-0420-SPIRITS obtained. Bilingual labels applied (EN/CN). All 150 bottles QR-verified on blockchain. Stored in Shanghai free trade zone bonded warehouse at 18Â°C, 65% humidity.
